step_8_analysis.justification: The interviewer asked three questions directly related to e-commerce experience. The depth of the questions was basic, focusing on definitions and familiarity with e-commerce metrics. The candidate's answers indicated a lack of direct experience with e-commerce platforms, metrics, and analysis, which supports the rejection reason.
